category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MRMGTC3DModelAttributeID
preference.preference_description: Defines the ID of the Generic Tool Catalog (GTC) class attribute that holds the filename of the 3D step model for a catalog component. The default value is -159003. If a future tool catalog uses a different attribute ID for this purpose, it can be reconfigured here.
